subPane.subId: Scope 'Project Source Files'; set:Project Source Files; class com.jetbrains.cidr.lang.search.scopes.ProjectSourcesScopeProvider$SourceFilesScope

task.summary: Default task
Purge project now that I better understand Android Studio.
Create first unit test.
Build UI for the main screen using TDD.
Popup appears when clicking add button
Popup goes away when you click save.
RecyclerView shows categories retrieved from database.
Map name input to category.
Refactor and clean up. Ensure code follows MVP architecture.
Implement Delete Button.
Implement Edit Button.
Just a bit of cleanup.
Make first item in Database the "To be budgeted". This is behind the scenes and won't really affect anything...yet.
Set the top bar to read "to be budgeted" and show the correct amount.
Move button works!
Bugfixes with the Move Button.
Cleaning up codebase before continuing onto the next section.
Set up the bottom navigation bar to switch between fragments.
Clean up tests so they work with the new setup.
Start setting up Accounts tab so that you can create, edit, and delete accounts, and give them a starting balance.
Started working on getting the Accounts balance to update in the "To be budgeted" field. Having a bit of trouble getting one tab to update a different one when that one isn't even on at the moment.
When you create an account, the balance is added to "to be budgeted"

MESSAGE.value: Purge project now that I better understand Android Studio.
Create first unit test.
Build UI for the main screen using TDD.
Popup appears when clicking add button
Popup goes away when you click save.
RecyclerView shows categories retrieved from database.
Map name input to category.
Refactor and clean up. Ensure code follows MVP architecture.
Implement Delete Button.
Implement Edit Button.
Just a bit of cleanup.
Make first item in Database the "To be budgeted". This is behind the scenes and won't really affect anything...yet.
Set the top bar to read "to be budgeted" and show the correct amount.
Move button works!
Bugfixes with the Move Button.
Cleaning up codebase before continuing onto the next section.
Set up the bottom navigation bar to switch between fragments.
Clean up tests so they work with the new setup.
Start setting up Accounts tab so that you can create, edit, and delete accounts, and give them a starting balance.
Started working on getting the Accounts balance to update in the "To be budgeted" field. Having a bit of trouble getting one tab to update a different one when that one isn't even on at the moment.
When you create an account, the balance is added to "to be budgeted"

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: When you create an account, the balance is added to "to be budgeted"
